tags: None
review: Good. She was very patience listening very carefully to the issues and problems and her words are more convincing and make me feel comfortable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I am consulting  Dr.shivakami for more than 15 years, not only for me even for my daughter now.she is very friendly and will give u the complete explanation about process of the treatment and make u comfortable.you can trust the doctor wholeheartedly. I would highly recommend 
Dr .shivakami for any kind of Gynic problems .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted sivagami gopinath for my pregnancy. My experience with her is really bad. *** ** ********* *** doesn't care for her patient. I was admitted after getting labour pain, everything was taken care by the assistant doctors only and she just came and said everything is fine and it ll normal delivery and left. She was hardly there for two minutes and left. ***** ****** ******* ****** *** **** ****** ******** ** *** ******** *** ******* *** * ******** ****** *** *********** *****She didnt attend my case ******* ** *** * *********** ***** ***** *** ****** ********* I was operated by other doctors. I stayed in the hospital for four days,she didnt come and check me and baby.*** *** * ****** ** **** *****doesn't care for patientS. Bad experience

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a smooth pregnancy without any complications. The doctor is initially friendly but I was made to take a lot of scans ***** **** *** ********* **** ***** ******* **** **** *** I was asked to take scans outside of SIMS too. I was told baby's stomach needs to be viewed better, so that any complications can be treated while the baby is in the womb, but speaking to the radiologist at the external scan clinic, I was told everything is ok and even if there is a problem we have to wait until the baby is born to do anything about it. On my 39th week checkup I was suddenly told baby's head is too big and I have to undergo c section. ***** *** ****** ****** So overall I underwent * ********* c section operation which is a major surgery and I was made to run around and take multiple scans ** **** *** ****** *** *** * *** **** ******** **** ********

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is a wonderful doctor, I confidently recommend,  she simplified my concerns and told me nothing to worry at all. We rarely we find such docs who treat without any medicines,  she took time to explain on diet and advised me on life style. I'm blessed to have met her. Thank you dr. You are a wonderful human being

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy with PCOD,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I consulted Dr.Sivakami Gopinath after consukting 4 other gynaecologists in the Chennai. I was trying to conceive with PCOD. Underwent so many tests. Finally, I met Dr.Sivakami who relieved me from all the complicated tests. I was given medicines for PCOD and did a regular follow up. We were planning to IUI or IVF but I needed nothing. With doctor's advice I had a natural conception in jus 6 months. She is so positive and supportive. My pregnancy was super smooth and she took care of my delivery too. I'm now blessed with a  little prince. Thank you so much Dr.Sivakami Gopinath.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is absolutely amazing, but even after booking appointments, we waited 2 full hour to see doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctors friendliness is much appreciated. She spent time with patient and explained the problem and also the treatment that needs to be done.
There was no unwanted tests prescribed  and she gave the confidence to the patient by her clear communication

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Nice experience.. would like to recommend to others.. friendly talk and detail explanation and giving a solution about the problem

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I'm vethavalli. I thank God for making me to meet such blessed humanity. I ensure that she will make me success in my treatment. Thank you
